title: Francis weather column: June brings warmth, and sometimes extreme weather – The Salem News
content: Francis weather column: June brings warmth, and sometimes extreme weather The Salem News This year, May gave us little significant weather. Gradually, our temperatures began to get warmer, and our average for the month was above normal at 60 degrees. The high for the month was 91 degrees and the low 37. Our precipitation, only 1.81 inches, … extreme weather – Read More…
